channel.title: Gear help
channel.description: Anyone suggest some armor/weapons to use for training. combat stats are in the 70s. Or maybe a site that would help with that. I have no idea what to use in p2p. Thanks :D

item.title: Gear help
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

no, I believe I need lvl 57 summoning. I haven’t even made my main a member yet, but I plan
on it this monday. So that’s why I’m looking for help to be ready then :D.

Read full topic

item.title: Gear help
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:6, topic:383668”]Thanks, I just realized that the other while looking at a summoning guide.
planning to run natures with the gharrak summoning npc.

I would suggest doing slayer none stop.
Buy a whip, dragon scimmy, and dds.
Then try to get all your cb skills to 85+
Rune armour, fighter torso, dragon defender, that one helm of neit or whatever and the best cape you can get.

When you get 55+ slayer you will make a lot of money.

thanks will look into that too <3[/quote] Do you have the lvl for the gharrak?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

how much dolla billz u got

and what npcs

if u gonna train melee and u got small bank just use rune+ pl8legs, berserk helm/neitiz, d boots, rune def, torso maybe and whip/ss
fury/glory, skillcape/obby cape/fcape etc etc etc
